extendedInfo.description: Tired of slicing Fruits? Try a taste of zombie flesh! Zombie Toss is the best free fast slice game. Action packed with Zombie blood and gore. If you like to slice and dice wait till you try the over the top game play of zombie toss. Unique, Fun, Addicting, Bloody, and Delicious.Get ready to serve up a plate of Zombie parts this Holiday season. Fun for the whole undead family.Good reviews from multiple media:"The gameplay is practically identical to Fruit Ninja, where you swipe on the screen to slice and dice flying objects. In this case, though, the objects are zombies, and you're a butcher who's collecting the meat for his post-apocalyptic delicatessen. To get a full order of meat, you'll have to perform timed combos and activate special moves. Zombie Toss has an outstanding graphical style, which is gory and gross but also cartoony and appealing." by Slide to PlayLIKE US ON FACEBOOK: http://facebook.com/GGeebyGMOFOLLOW US ON TWITTER: http://twitter.com/GGeebyGMO

reviews.title: Great game,and i must say killing cute zombies give me thrill!
reviews.comment: More free stuff please!
reviews.author: Ilman Nazim Roslim

reviews.title: Good so far
reviews.comment: More enjoyable than fruit ninja.better gameplay, graphics, and items than zombie swipe out. Also appears to much smoother than other similar games.
reviews.author: Geremy Lucier

reviews.comment: I give it a two because it\'s not optimized for the galaxy note 2. It\'s Just a bad port. Seriously? I love the game would have even pay for stuff. 2/5 would not recommend.
reviews.author: Christian Medina

reviews.title: In love..
reviews.comment: I\'m a huge fan of zombie swipeout and this game is maybe a percent away from topping it!! 5 stars fa sho

reviews.title: A cool killer swiping zombie game a good time killer
reviews.comment: Awesome

reviews.title: Very Good
reviews.comment: A must try game! :) good graphics and gameplay

reviews.comment: Slice and dice flesh of the undead instead of the flesh of fruit!No bananas or pineapple here,just rotting flying undead.\tCut em down jack! Let em rip Tater chip!!!
reviews.author: Shannon Menendez-Hipsher

reviews.title: you gotz to try it out!
reviews.comment: Its great and fun very intertainin.

reviews.title: new experience in slashing game!
reviews.comment: So far I like the game! What\'s better than chopping up zombies and take their meat and serve on your meals?! Brilliant ideas and good graphic!
reviews.author: Joseph Yap KimSung

reviews.title: I like the  concept pf this game
reviews.comment: Very amusing i enjoy playing this more then fruit ninja would have given 5 stars but realisticly the game is not that perfect but u never know once their is an update and be a good one then i will give top marks but still overall the best zombie fruit like ninja slashing game i have come across to date
reviews.author: Michael Bakkar

reviews.title: Excellent fun...
reviews.comment: Great game play that is fast paced and challenging, especially in melee mode. I can\'t seem to get my purchased gold teeth to integrate, however, otherwise, a 5 star rating.
reviews.author: Phillip Forgione

reviews.title: Yea
reviews.comment: Odd twist on classic gameplay. Excellent graphics, sound, framerate, and reasonable shop items. Only request is a small detail about which flying items can hurt or help you. Instead of swiping to find out what it does. Updates could include a endless area with scoreboard? Or facebook intergration? Love it so far! Great work devs!
reviews.author: Bobby Smith

reviews.title: Slice and Forget!
reviews.comment: Great game.Addictive.quality of the animation are beautiful for a game like this.Colors pop!Great way to KILL ti..oh I mean zombies!

reviews.title: Enjoyable
reviews.comment: Great game play :-D

reviews.title: Fun to kill zombies

reviews.title: Fun, challenging
reviews.comment: Great art design, it\'s fun but challenging. Haven\'t gotten very far into the game yet but I\'m looking forward to doing so.
